languages.text: Wielder takes (TGH/3)% less Fire damage and their Burning is reduced by (TB) at the start of their turn.

traits.locale_text: Wielder takes (TGH/3)% less Fire damage and their Burning is reduced by (TB) at the start of their turn.

languages.text: The wearer suffers −<u>({g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}TGH{/g} / 3)</u>% less {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}fire damage{/g}. If they are suffering from {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} at the start of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the level of burning is reduced by −{unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus}.
languages.original_text: Персонаж получает на <u>({g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}ВЫН{/g} / 3)</u>% меньше {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}огненного урона{/g}. Если на него действует {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}горение{/g}, в начале {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} персонажа уровень горения уменьшается на {unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus}.

traits.locale_text: The wearer suffers −<u>(TGH / 3)</u>% less fire damage. If they are burning, at the start of their turn the level of burning is reduced by −{unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus}.

The wearer suffers −<u>({g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}TGH{/g} / 3)</u>% less {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}fire damage{/g}. If they are suffering from {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} at the start of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the level of burning is reduced by −{unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus}.

The wearer suffers −<u>({g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}TGH{/g} / 3)</u>% less {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}fire damage{/g}. If they are suffering from {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} at the start of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the level of burning is reduced by −{unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus}.

The wearer suffers −<u>({g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}TGH{/g} / 3)</u>% less {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}fire damage{/g}. If they are suffering from {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} at the start of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the level of burning is reduced by −{unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus}.

languages.text: Giyen kişi, %<u>({g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}DAY{/g} / 3)</u> daha az {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}ateş hasarına{/g} maruz kalır. {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Turunun{/g} başında {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}yanıyorsa{/g} yanma seviyesi {unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus} kadar azalır.
languages.original_text: The wearer suffers −<u>({g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}TGH{/g} / 3)</u>% less {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}fire damage{/g}. If they are suffering from {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} at the start of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the level of burning is reduced by −{unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus}.

traits.locale_text: Giyen kişi, %<u>({g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}DAY{/g} / 3)</u> daha az {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}ateş hasarına{/g} maruz kalır. {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Turunun{/g} başında {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}yanıyorsa{/g} yanma seviyesi {unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus} kadar azalır.

Giyen kişi, %<u>({g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}DAY{/g} / 3)</u> daha az ateş hasarına maruz kalır. {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Turunun{/g} başında yanıyorsa {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}yanma{/g} seviyesi {unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus} kadar azalır.

languages.text: El portador sufre un −<u>({g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}RES{/g} / 3)</u> % menos de {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}daño por fuego{/g}. Si tiene el efecto {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}quemadura{/g} al comienzo de su {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}, su nivel de quemadura se reduce en −{unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus}.
languages.original_text: The wearer suffers −<u>({g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}TGH{/g} / 3)</u>% less {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}fire damage{/g}. If they are suffering from {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} at the start of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the level of burning is reduced by −{unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus}.

traits.locale_text: El portador sufre un −<u>(RES / 3)</u> % menos de daño por fuego. Si tiene el efecto quemadura al comienzo de su turno, su nivel de quemadura se reduce en −{unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus}.

languages.text: 装备者承受的{g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}火焰伤害{/g}降低<u>（{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}/3）</u>%，如果装备者{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始时处于{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃烧{/g}状态，则燃烧等级降低{unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus}级。
languages.original_text: The wearer suffers −<u>({g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}TGH{/g} / 3)</u>% less {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}fire damage{/g}. If they are suffering from {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} at the start of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the level of burning is reduced by −{unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus}.

traits.locale_text: 装备者承受的火焰伤害降低<u>（坚韧/3）</u>%，如果装备者回合开始时处于燃烧状态，则燃烧等级降低{unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus}级。

languages.text: Der Träger erleidet −<u>({g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}ZÄH{/g} / 3)</u> % weniger {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}Feuerschaden{/g}. Leidet er zu Beginn seines {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zuges{/g} unter {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Verbrennen{/g}, wird die Stufe von Verbrennen um −{unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus} verringert.
languages.original_text: The wearer suffers −<u>({g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}TGH{/g} / 3)</u>% less {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}fire damage{/g}. If they are suffering from {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} at the start of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the level of burning is reduced by −{unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus}.

traits.locale_text: Der Träger erleidet −<u>(ZÄH / 3)</u> % weniger Feuerschaden. Leidet er zu Beginn seines Zuges unter Verbrennen, wird die Stufe von Verbrennen um −{unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus} verringert.

languages.text: Le porteur subit -<u>({g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}END{/g} / 3)</u> % de {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}dégâts de feu{/g} en moins. S'il souffre de {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Combustion{/g} au début de son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}, le niveau de Combustion est réduit de -{unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus}.
languages.original_text: The wearer suffers −<u>({g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}TGH{/g} / 3)</u>% less {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}fire damage{/g}. If they are suffering from {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} at the start of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the level of burning is reduced by −{unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus}.

traits.locale_text: Le porteur subit -<u>(END / 3)</u> % de dégâts de feu en moins. S'il souffre de Combustion au début de son tour, le niveau de Combustion est réduit de -{unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus}.

languages.text: 使用者が受ける{g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}炎ダメージ{/g}は−<u>（{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}TGH{/g}/3）</u>%低下する。使用者が{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}の開始時に{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}炎上{/g}効果を受けている場合、炎上のレベルが−{unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus}低下する。

If they are suffering from {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} at the start of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the level of burning is reduced by −{unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus}.

traits.locale_text: 使用者が受ける炎ダメージは−<u>（TGH/3）</u>%低下する。使用者がターンの開始時に炎上効果を受けている場合、炎上のレベルが−{unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus}低下する。
使用者が受ける炎ダメージは−<u>（TGH/3）</u>%低下する。使用者がターンの開始時に炎上効果を受けている場合、炎上のレベルが−{unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus}低下する。

Если на него действует {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}горение{/g}, в начале {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} персонажа уровень горения уменьшается на {unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus}.

If they are suffering from {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} at the start of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the level of burning is reduced by −{unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus}.

traits.locale_text: Персонаж получает на <u>(ВЫН / 3)</u>% меньше огненного урона. Если на него действует горение, в начале хода персонажа уровень горения уменьшается на {unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus}.
Персонаж получает на <u>(ВЫН / 3)</u>% меньше огненного урона. Если на него действует горение, в начале хода персонажа уровень горения уменьшается на {unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus}.
